description.p: Romansh is a group of Rhaeto-Romance dialects spoken predominantly in the south-eastern Swiss canton of Grisons_
Romansh has a strong dialectal fragmentation. Almost every village has its own vernacular, and five different regional dialects own standardised written form_
Le romanche fait partie du groupe de dialectes rhéto-romans parlés principalement dans le canton des Grisons (sud-est de la Suisse)_
Le romanche a une forte fragmentation dialectale. Presque chaque village a sa propre langue vernaculaire, et on dénombre cinq dialectes régionaux différents ayant chacun sa forme écrite standardisée_
Romani (also Romany or Gypsy) is a Balkanised neo-Indo-European language belonging to the Indo-Aryan branch. It is spoken principally in Europe by Romani people_

The alphabets used in the different varieties of the Romany generally correspond to those countries where the corresponding Roma communities live. The alphabets of use are the Latin, the Cyrillic, the Arabic and the Greek alphabets_
Le romani est une langue néo-indo-européenne balkanisée appartenant à la branche indo-aryenne. Il est parlé principalement en Europe par les Roms_

Les alphabets utilisés dans les différentes variantes du romani correspondent généralement à ceux des pays où vivent les communautés roms concernées. Les alphabets utilisés sont le latin, le cyrillique, l’arabe et le grec_
Romanian is a Romance language spoken principally in Romania and Moldova. Much of the total Romanian vocabulary is derived from Latin_
Romanian has four varieties: Daco-Romanian, Istro-Romanian, Aromanian and Megleno-Romanian_
Le roumain est une langue romane parlée principalement en Roumanie et en Moldavie. Une grande partie du vocabulaire roumain total est dérivée du latin_
Le roumain possède quatre dialectes: le daco-roumain, l’istro-roumain, l’aroumain et le mégléno-roumain_

source.description: Rennellese Sign Language is an extinct sign language used Rennell Island, in Solomon Islands . Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_
Russian Sign Language is a sign language used in Russia. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_
Kirundi is a Bantu language. It is one of the official languages of Burundi_

description.p: Russian is an East Slavic language with a close relation to Ukrainian and Belarusian. It is an official or unofficial but widely spoken language in some countries that were once constituent republics of the Soviet Union_
Russian is the most geographically widespread language of Eurasia and the most widely spoken of the Slavic languages_
Russian is written by Cyrillic alphabet_

Le russe est une langue slave orientale et est proche de l’ukrainien et du biélorusse. Le russe est une langue officielle ou non mais parlée dans certains pays qui étaient auparavant des républiques de l’Union soviétique_
C’est la langue de l’Eurasie la plus étendue géographiquement et la langue slave la plus parlée_
Le russe est écrit avec l’alphabet cyrillique_

source.description: Sango is a Ngbandi-based creole language. It is one of the official languages of the Central African Republic_

description.p: Scots is the Germanic language variety spoken in Lowland Scotland and parts of Ulster_
It is a recognised regional language of the United Kingdom, protected under the European Charter for Regional or Minority Languages_
Le scots est une langue germanique parlée en Écosse et dans le nord de l’Irlande_
Il est reconnu par le Royaume-Uni comme langue régionale de l’Écosse, selon la charte européenne des langues régionales ou minoritaires_

source.description: Southern Kurdish (Pehlewani) is a Kurdish dialect predominantly spoken in western Iran and eastern Iraq. Native speakers use various different alphabets to write Southern Kurdish, the most common ones are extensions of the standard Kurdish alphabets (Latin or Perso-Arabic script)_
Saudi Arabian Sign Language is a sign language used in Saudi Arabia. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_

original_name.lg_version: Langue des signes de Belgique Francophone

label.lg_version: langue des signes de Belgique Francophone

source.description: South African Sign Language is a sign language used in South Africa. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_

Swiss-German Sign Language is a sign language used in Switzerland by the German-speaking community. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_
Sierra Leone Sign Language is a sign language used in Sierra Leona. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_

description.p: Sinhala is the native language of the Sinhalese people, who make up the largest ethnic group in Sri Lanka. It belongs to the Indo-Aryan branch of the Indo-European languages_
Sinhala has its own writing system, the Sinhala alphabet, which is a member of the Brahmic family of scripts, and a descendant of the ancient Indian Brahmi script_
Le cingalais est une langue appartenant au groupe indo-aryen de la famille des langues indo-européennes. Il est parlé à Sri Lanka_
L’alphabet cingalais compte environ 50 lettres dont quelques-unes sont rarement utilisées dans l’écriture moderne_

source.description: Sikkimese is a Tibetan language. It is written using Tibetan alphabet_

Swiss-Italian Sign Language is a sign language used in Switzerland by the Italian-speaking community. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_

description.p: Slovak is a member of the western subgroup of Slavic languages, mainly spoken in Slovakia where it is protected by a language law_
Slovak is very close to the Czech_
Le slovaque est une langue appartenant au sous-groupe des langues slaves occidentales, principalement parlée en Slovaquie, où elle est protégée par une loi linguistique_
Le slovaque est très proche du tchèque_

source.description: Singapore Sign Language is a sign language used in Singapore. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_

description.p: Slovenian or Slovene is a member of the southern subgroup of the Slavic languages, spoken mainly in Slovenia_
The distinctive characteristic of Slovene that it has preserved the use of dual grammatical number in addition to singular and plural_
Le slovène est une langue appartenant au sous-groupe méridional des langues slaves, parlée principalement en Slovénie_
L’une des caractéristiques du slovène est qu’il a conservé l’usage grammatical du duel (qui représente exactement deux unités) en plus du singulier et du pluriel_

Northern or North Sami (davvisámegiella) is the most widely spoken of all Sami languages which belong to the Finno-Ugrian branch of the Uralic languages. It is spoken in the northern parts of Norway, Sweden and Finland_
Orthography of Northern Sami has experienced numerous changes_
Le same du Nord (davvisámegiella ou sámegiella) est la plus parlée des langues sames qui appartiennent
à la branche finno-ougrienne des langues ouraliennes. Il est utilisé dans le nord de la Norvège, de la Suède et de la Finlande. L’orthographe du same du Nord a connu de nombreux changements_

source.description: Samoan is a Malayo-Polynesian language. It is one of the official languages of Samoa and American Samoa_

description.p: Somali is an Afro-Asiatic language, belonging to that family’s Cushitic branch. It is spoken as a mother tongue by ethnic Somalis_
A number of writing systems have been used for transcribing the language. Of these, the Somali Latin alphabet, officially adopted in 1972, is the most widely used_
Le somali est une langue parlée dans la Corne de l’Afrique. Il appartient à la branche couchitique de la famille chamito-sémitique (également dite afro-asiatique)_
Différents systèmes d’écriture ont été utilisés pour transcrire le somali. L’alphabet latin somali est aujourd’hui le système d’écriture du somali le plus répandu_

source.description: Southern Sotho is a Bantu language. It is one of the official languages of South Africa_

description.p: Spanish is a member of the Romance language family. It is spoken in Spain and in the continents of North and South America_
Spanish is second after Mandarin in terms of its number of native speakers worldwide. From the last decades of the 20th century, the study of Spanish as a foreign language has grown significantly_
L’espagnol fait partie de la famille des langues romanes. Il est parlé en Espagne et en Amérique du Nord et du Sud_

L’espagnol est la deuxième langue après le mandarin en termes de nombre de locuteurs natifs dans le monde entier. Depuis les dernières décennies du XXe siècle, l’étude de l’espagnol comme langue étrangère a augmenté de façon significative_
Albanian (shqip) forms a separate branch of the Indo-European family. It is the official language of Albania and also spoken in Kosovo, the Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia, Italy and Greece_
Albanian is divided into two major dialects: Gheg (spoken in north) and Tosk (spoken in south)_

L’albanais (shqip) forme une branche distincte de la famille indo-européenne. C’est la langue officielle de l’Albanie et il est également parlé au Kosovo, dans l’ancienne République yougoslave de Macédoine, en Italie et en Grèce. À la suite de la diaspora moderne, on rencontre aussi des albanophones dans d’autres parties du monde_
L’albanais se subdivise en deux dialectes principaux: le Gheg (parlé au nord) et le Tosk (parlé au sud)_

source.description: Sri Lankan Sign Language is a sign language used in Sri Lanka. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_

description.p: Serbian is the standardised variety of the Serbo-Croatian language, spoken mainly in Serbia, Montenegro, Bosnia and Herzegovina. Standard Serbian is based on the Shtokavian dialect of Serbo-Croatian_
Serbian uses both Cyrillic and Latin alphabets_
Le serbe est la variante standard de la langue serbo-croate, parlée principalement en Serbie, en Bosnie-Herzégovine et au Monténégro. Sa norme est basée sur le dialecte chtokavien du serbo-croate_
Le serbe utilise les alphabets cyrillique et latin_

source.description: Sirionó is a Tupian indigenous language. It is one of the official languages of Bolivia_
Spanish Sign Language is a sign language used in Spain. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_

Swiss-French Sign Language is a sign language used in Switzerland by the French-speaking community. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_
Swazi is a Bantu language. It is one of the official languages of South Africa_
Slovakian Sign Language is a sign language used in Slovakia. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_

The Swahili language is a Bantu language and the mother tongue of the Swahili people. It is spoken by various communities inhabiting the African Great Lakes region and other parts of south-east Africa, mainly as a lingua franca. The closely related Comorian language, spoken in the Comoros Islands, is sometimes considered a Swahili dialect_

Les langues swahilies (souahélies) sont un groupe de langues bantoues de l’Afrique de l’Est. Elles possèdent des caractéristiques communes et surtout un vocabulaire commun qui permet à un de leurs locuteurs de se faire plus ou moins comprendre des divers locuteurs de ce groupe de langues; on ne peut parler d’intercompréhension pour toutes ces formes tant la variété linguistique est grande. La plus utilisée et populaire de ces langues est le kiswahili, une version standardisée_
Comorian is a Bantu language. It is one of the official languages of Comoros_

description.p: Swedish is a North Germanic language, spoken mainly in Sweden and parts of Finland. It is largely mutually intelligible with Norwegian and Danish_
Swedish uses two genders: neutrum and utrum which unifies the old masculin and femenin_

Le suédois est une langue germanique septentrionale, parlée principalement en Suède et dans certaines parties de la Finlande. Il est en grande partie mutuellement intelligible avec le norvégien et le danois_
Le suédois utilise deux genres: le neutrum et l’utrum qui rassemble les anciens genres masculin et féminin_

source.description: Swedish Sign Language is a sign language used in Sweden. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_

Al-Sayyid Bedouin Sign Language is a village sign language used by the al-Sayyid Bedouin tribe in Israel. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_

description.p: Tamil is a Dravidian language spoken in South-East Asia_
Tamil is one of the longest surviving classical languages in the world; ‘the only language of contemporary India which is recognisably continuous with a classical past_’

Tamil was written using a script called the vaṭṭeḻuttu amongst others such as Grantha and Pallava script. The current Tamil script consists of 12 vowels, 18 consonants and one special character, the āytam. The vowels and consonants combine to form 216 compound characters, giving a total of 247 characters_

Le tamoul ou tamil est la langue des Tamouls, parlée dans l’Asie du Sud-Est. Le tamoul appartient à la famille des langues dravidiennes. C’est une des plus anciennes langues toujours parlées, restée quasi inchangée depuis environ 2 000 ans_
Il s’écrit au moyen d’un alphasyllabaire dérivé du grantha_

source.description: Tetum is a Malayo-Polynesian language. It is one of the official languages of East Timor_

description.p: Tajik is a variety of modern Persian spoken in Central Asia. Most speakers of Tajik live in Tajikistan (where it is the official language) and Uzbekistan. In Afghanistan the dialect is less influenced by Turkic languages and is called Dari. The standard language is based on the north-western dialects of Tajik. Tajik also retains numerous archaic elements in its vocabulary, pronunciation, and grammar that have been lost elsewhere in the Persophone world, in part due to its relative isolation in the mountains of Central Asia_
In Tajikistan and other countries of the former Soviet Union, Tajik Persian is currently written in Cyrillic script while the Perso-Arabic script is used in Iran and Afghanistan_

Le tadjik ou tadjike est une langue appartenant au groupe iranien de la famille des langues indo-européennes. Cette langue est proche du persan et du dari. Le tadjik est parlé en Asie centrale, principalement au Tadjikistan (dont il est la langue officielle), et par des minorités linguistiques en Afghanistan, en Iran, en Ouzbékistan et dans le Xinjiang, région autonome de Chine_

Au Tadjikistan et en Ouzbékistan, la langue s’écrit au moyen d’un alphabet cyrillique augmenté de signes diacritiques. En revanche, dans les autres pays, elle est transcrite au moyen de l’alphabet perso-arabe_

Thai, or more precisely Siamese or Central Thai, is a member of the Tai group of the Tai–Kadai language family. It is a tonal and analytic language. Thai also has a complex orthography and relational markers. Thai is mutually intelligible with Lao_
The Thais adopted and modified the Khmer script to create their own writing system. It is an abugida script_
Le thaï ou siamois ou Thai-An est une langue du groupe taï de la famille des langues taï-kadaï_
Le thaï utilise un alphasyllabaire particulier (alphabet thaï) dérivé de l’alphabet khmer issu de l’alphabet pâli, adapté pour pouvoir transcrire le système tonal de la langue_
Tigrinya is an Afro-Asiatic language, belonging to the family’s Semitic branch. It is spoken by ethnic Tigray-Tigrinya in the Horn of Africa_

Tigrinya is written in the Ge’ez script, originally developed for Ge’ez, also called Ethiopic. The Ge’ez script is an abugida: each symbol represents a consonant + vowel syllable, and the symbols are organised in groups of similar symbols on the basis of both the consonant and the vowel_
Le tigrigna ou tigrinya est une langue éthiosémitique parlée essentiellement au nord-est de la Corne de l’Afrique_
Le tigrigna s’écrit au moyen d’une version de l’alphasyllabaire guèze auquel s’ajoutent quelques caractères_

source.description: Tokelauan is a Malayo-Polynesian language. It is one of the official languages of Tokelau_
Tacana is a Tacanan indigenous language. It is one of the official languages of Bolivia_
Toromono is a Tacanan indigenous language. It is one of the official languages of Bolivia_
Tongan is a Malayo-Polynesian language. It is one of the official languages of Tonga_
Tok Pisin is an English-based creole language. It is one of the official languages of Papua New Guinea_
Tapieté is a Tupian indigenous language. It is one of the official languages of Bolivia_
Trinitario is an Arawakan indigenous language. It is one of the official languages of Bolivia_
Tunisian Sign Language is a sign language used in Tunisia. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_
Turkish Sign Language is a sign language used in Turkey. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_
Tswana is a Bantu language. It is one of the official languages of South Africa_
Tsonga is a Bantu language. It is one of the official languages of South Africa_
Thai Sign Language is a sign language used in Thailand. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_
Taiwan Sign Language is a sign language used in Taiwan. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_
Tebul Sign Language is a sign language used in Uluban village in Mali. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_

description.p: Turkmen or Turkoman is spoken in Asia. Turkmen is a member of the East Oghuz branch of the Turkic family of languages; its closest relatives being Anatolian Turkish and Azerbaijani, with which it shares a relatively high degree of mutual intelligibility_
Officially, Turkmen currently is rendered in the ‘Täze Elipbiý’, or ‘New Alphabet’, which is based on the Latin alphabet. However, the old ‘Soviet’ Cyrillic alphabet is still in wide use_
Le turkmène est une langue appartenant au groupe des langues turques, parlée en Asie centrale, principalement au Turkménistan_

Le turkmène a été écrit avec un alphabet arabe adapté, puis un alphabet latin jusqu’en 1940. L’État soviétique force alors l’adoption d’une variante de l’alphabet cyrillique pour l’écriture du turkmène. Depuis 1997, l’alphabet officiel est une variante de l’alphabet latin avec quelques diacritiques, proche de celui du turc_
Turkish is the most widely spoken of the Turkic languages in south-eastern Europe and western Asia. It is closely related to Azeri and Turkmen_
In 1928, as one of Atatürk’s Reforms, the Arabic script was replaced with a Latin alphabet_
Le turc est la plus parlée des langues turques en Europe du Sud et en Asie occidentale. Il est très proche de l’azéri et du turkmène_
En 1928, l’une des réformes d’Atatürk fut de remplacer l’écriture arabe par l’alphabet latin_

source.description: Tuvaluan is a Malayo-Polynesian language. It is one of the official languages of Tuvalu_
Tanzanian Sign Language is a sign language used in Tanzania. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_
Ugandan Sign Language is a sign language used in Uganda. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_
Uruguayan Sign Language is a sign language used in Uruguay. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_
Ukrainian Sign Language is a sign language used in Ukraine. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_

description.p: Ukrainian is one of the East Slavic languages and shares many grammatical and lexical features with other members of the branch, Russian and Belorusian. It is spoken mainly in Ukraine_
Ukrainian is written with the Cyrillic alphabet_

L’ukrainien fait partie des langues slaves et partage de nombreuses caractéristiques grammaticales et lexicales avec d’autres langues de cette branche, le russe et le biélorusse. Il est parlé principalement en Ukraine_
L’ukrainien s’écrit avec l’alphabet cyrillique_

source.description: Urubú-Kaapor Sign Language is a village sign language used by Ka'apor people in Brazilia. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_
Undetermined is provided for those situations in which a language or languages must be indicated but the language cannot be identified_
«Indéterminé»: pour les situations dans lesquelles une ou plusieurs langues doivent être signalées mais la langue ne peut pas être identifiée_

description.p: Urdu is a standardised register of the Hindustani language. Urdu is historically associated with the Muslims of the region of Hindustan_
Urdu is written right-to-left in an extension of the Persian alphabet, which is itself an extension of the Arabic alphabet. Urdu is associated with the Nastaʿlīq style of Persian calligraphy_
L’ourdou ou urdu est une langue appartenant au groupe indo-iranien de la famille des langues indo-européennes_
En Inde, il est connu sous le nom de «hindi» et s’écrit en caractères sanskrits, mais ses locuteurs musulmans le nomment «ourdou» et l’écrivent en caractères arabes, comme au Pakistan_

source.description: Uru is an Uru-Chipaya indigenous language. It is one of the official languages of Bolivia_

description.p: Uzbek is an Eastern Turkic language and is spoken by the Uzbeks in Uzbekistan and elsewhere in Central Asia_

Until 1992, Uzbek continued to be written using a Cyrillic alphabet almost everywhere, but now in Uzbekistan the Latin script has been officially re-introduced, although the use of Cyrillic is still widespread_
L’ouzbek est une langue appartenant au groupe des langues turques de la famille des langues altaïques. Il est surtout utilisé en Asie centrale, principalement en Ouzbékistan_

L’alphabet ouzbek fut perso-arabe, latin, cyrillique et, à partir de 1992, à nouveau latin mais remanié. De nos jours, l’écriture en ouzbek cyrillique reste encore très largement employée. Les Ouzbeks de Chine utilisent un alphabet arabe modifié_

source.description: Venda is a Bantu language. It is one of the official languages of South Africa_

description.p: Vietnamese is the native language of Vietnamese people. It is part of the Austroasiatic language family of which it has, by far, the most speakers_
The Vietnamese alphabet (quốc ngữ) in use today is a Latin alphabet with additional diacritics for tones, and certain letters_

Le vietnamien appartient à la branche môn-khmère des langues austro-asiatiques. Il est la langue austro-asiatique qui possède le plus de locuteurs. C’est une langue isolante et monosyllabique, dotée d’un système de 6 tons_
Dans l’écriture latinisée utilisée actuellement, le Quốc ngữ, les mots figurent comme une succession de monosyllabes_
Flemish (Vlaams) or Belgian Dutch is the Dutch language as spoken in Flanders, the northern part of Belgium_
Differences between Flemish and Dutch are minimal. Using Flemish for the official language in Flanders is misleading: the only official language in Flanders is standard Dutch_
Le flamand (vlaams) ou belge néerlandais est la langue néerlandaise parlée en Flandre, la partie nord de la Belgique_

Les différences entre le flamand et le néerlandais sont minimes. L’utilisation du flamand comme langue officielle en Flandre est trompeuse: la seule langue officielle en Flandre est le néerlandais standard_

comment.lg_version: Documentation for ISO 639 identifier "VRO": This individual language is member of a macrolanguage : Estonian (est)

source.description: Moldova Sign Language is a sign language used in Moldova. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_
Venezuelan Sign Language is a sign language used in Venezuela. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_

Valencian Sign Language is a sign language used in the Valencian community, in Spain. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_

description.p: Walloon is a Romance language, a langue d’oïl dialect indigenous to the greater part of Wallonia, the French-speaking south part of Belgium_
Numerous associations are working to keep the language alive. On a government level, Walloon is officially recognised as a regional indigenous language_
Le wallon est une langue romane, une langue d’oïl autochtone dans la plus grande partie de la Wallonie, la partie sud de Belgique parlant français_
De nombreuses associations travaillent à garder la langue vivante. Au niveau du gouvernement, le wallon est officiellement reconnu comme une langue autochtone régionale_

source.description: Xhosa is a Bantu language. It is one of the official languages of South Africa_
Kenyan Sign Language is a sign language used in Kenya. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_
Malaysian Sign Language is a sign language used in Malaysia. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_
Moroccan Sign Language is a sign language used in Morocco. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_
Yaminava is a Panoan indigenous language. It is one of the official languages of Bolivia_

description.p: Yiddish is a Germanic language, the historical language of the Ashkenazi Jews in central and east Europe_
Yiddish is traditionally written in a fully vocalised variety of Hebrew script. A transliteration into the Latin alphabet is quite often used_
Le yiddish est une langue germanique, la langue historique des Juifs ashkénazes d’Europe centrale et orientale_
Il est traditionnellement écrit dans une variante entièrement vocalisée de l’écriture hébraïque. Une transcription en alphabet latin est très souvent utilisée_

source.description: Yugoslavian Sign Language is a sign language used in countries of the former Yougoslavia. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_
Yue Chinese, often referred as Cantonese, is a Chinese language. It is one of the official languages of Hong Kong and Macau. Yue Chinese is written in Chinese characters_
Yuqui is a Tupian indigenous language. It is one of the official languages of Bolivia_
Yuracare is an indigenous language isolate. It is one of the official languages of Bolivia_

description.p: Chinese (Zhōngwén) is a group of related but in many cases mutually unintelligible language varieties, forming a branch of the Sino-Tibetan language family. All varieties of Chinese are tonal and analytic_
The written form of the standard language, based on the logograms known as Chinese characters, is shared by literate speakers of otherwise unintelligible dialects_
Les langues chinoises ou langues sinitiques, souvent désignées dans leur ensemble sous le nom de «chinois» (zhōngwén), appartiennent à la famille des langues sino-tibétaines_

Dans leur caractère le plus universel, on considère la langue écrite, transcendant la prononciation des divers parlers. La langue parlée dans son caractère le plus général est le plus souvent appelée «hanyu», même si d’autres groupes ethniques ont progressivement adopté cette langue_

source.description: Zimbabwe Sign Language is a sign language used in Zimbabwe. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_

Malay is a major language of the Austronesian family. The Standard Malay has various official names; in Singapore and Brunei this individual language is called Bahasa Melayu (Malay). Malay is written using the Arabic or the Latin script_
Zambian Sign Language is a sign language used in Zambia. Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions_

description.p: Zulu is the language of the Zulu people, the vast majority of whom live in South Africa. Zulu is the second most widely spoken Bantu language after Shona_
Like many other Bantu languages, it is written using the Latin alphabet_
Standard Zulu as it is taught in schools (deep Zulu), differs in various respects from the language spoken by people living in cities (urban Zulu)_
Le zoulou est une langue appartenant au groupe nguni des langues bantoues (qui comprend également le xhosa et le ndébélé). C’est l’une des langues les plus répandues en Afrique_
Le zoulou, comme toutes les langues indigènes d’Afrique du Sud, était une langue orale jusqu’à l'arrivée de missionnaires européens, qui l’ont transcrit en utilisant l’alphabet latin_

source.description: It could be a feature for a DVD without any specific linguistic content (e.g. only music, we cannot say that the language of the DVD is English or French, etc.)_

Cela pourrait être un élément d’un DVD sans aucun contenu linguistique spécifique (par exemple: seulement de la musique; nous ne pouvons pas savoir si la langue du DVD est en anglais ou en français; etc.)_

label.lg_version: nav satura, kas būtu kādā valodā

source.description: Sign languages are languages which mainly use signs made with the hands, the arms or the body and facial expressions. Sign languages have been developed for communities of deaf people but are also used by people with speaking disability_

description.p: The Slavic or Slavonic languages, a group of closely related languages of the Slavic peoples and a subgroup of Indo-European languages, have speakers in most of eastern Europe, much of the Balkans, parts of central Europe, and the northern part of Asia_
Slavic languages are usually divided on the basis of geographical and genealogical principle into three main branches: East, West and South Slavic branchs_
The Slavic languages are a relatively homogeneous and conservative family, compared with other families of Indo-European languages. Most Slavic languages have a rich, fusional morphology_

Les langues slaves sont des langues indo-européennes, du groupe balto-slave. Elles forment un groupe de langues important dont les locuteurs se trouvent majoritairement en Europe centrale, dans les Balkans, en Europe de l’Est, en Sibérie, en Extrême-Orient russe et en Asie centrale_

Les langues slaves sont généralement divisées sur la base des principes géographique et généalogique en trois branches principales: orientale (qui utilise l’alphabet cyrillique), occidentale (qui utilise l’alphabet latin) et méridionale (qui utilise l’alphabet cyrillique ou latin)_

Les langues slaves forment une famille relativement homogène et conservatrice en comparaison aux autres familles de langues indo-européennes. La plupart des langues slaves ont une riche morphologie fusionnelle_
Valencian is a Catalan dialect spoken in the Valencian Community in Spain_
The Valencian Academy of the Language considers Catalan and Valencian to be simply two names for the same language_
Le valencien est un dialecte catalan parlé dans la Communauté de Valence en Espagne_
L’Académie valencienne de la langue considère simplement le catalan et le valencien comme deux noms pour la même langue_

Malaysian, or Standard Malay, is the official language of Malaysia and a standardised register of the Malacca dialect of Malay. It is a compulsory subject in primary and secondary school. The Malaysian name for the language is Bahasa Malaysia (literally ‘the language of Malaysia’)_
The Malaysian language is normally written using a Latin alphabet called Rumi, though an Arabic alphabet called Jawi also exists_

Le malais ou malaisien (bahasa Malaysia, littéralement «langue de la Malaisie») est l’appellation officielle de la langue nationale de la Malaisie. Il exprime une volonté politique de fédérer les diverses communautés du pays grâce à une langue partagée par tous les citoyens. Le malaisien est une des formes du malais, appelé également «malais standard». Il est enseigné dans toutes les écoles du pays et sert d’outil de communication interethnique_
Le malais moderne et l’indonésien s’écrivent avec l’alphabet latin, tandis que le malais classique utilise l’alphabet arabe_
Montenegrin is the standardised variety of the Serbo-Croatian used by Montenegrins. It is based on the Shtokavian dialect of Serbo-Croatian_
The language of Montenegro was called Serbian. The idea of a Montenegrin standard language separate from Serbian appeared in the 2000s after the Serbia-Montenegro breakdown_
Montenegrin uses more the Latin alphabet than the Cyrillic. In both alphabets there are two additional letters_
Le monténégrin est la variante normalisée du serbo-croate utilisé par les Monténégrins. Il est basé sur le dialecte chtokavien du serbo-croate_
La langue du Monténégro a été appelée «serbe». L’idée d’une langue monténégrine standard distincte du serbe est apparue dans les années 2000 après l’effondrement de la Serbie-Monténégro_
Le monténégrin emploie plus l’alphabet latin que cyrillique. Dans les deux alphabets, il y a deux lettres supplémentaires_

source.description: Moldavian or Moldovan is a name of the Romanian language in the Republic of Moldova. The identity between the mother tongues of the Moldovans and Romanians has been officially acknowledged since the reintroduction of the Latin script in 1989; the 1991 Declaration of Independence of Moldova thereupon called the official language ‘Romanian’. Nevertheless, the 1994 Constitution only provided official status to ‘Moldovan’. In the early 2000s the Parliament of the Republic of Moldova adopted a law defining ‘Moldovan’ and ‘Romanian’ as designations for the same language (glottonyms). The breakaway region of Transnistria continues to recognise ‘Moldovan’ as one of its official languages_

Le moldave est, selon l’article 13 de sa Constitution, la langue officielle de la République de Moldavie. C’est une dénomination politique; du point de vue strictement linguistique et en termes de sociolinguistique, le roumain et le moldave sont une seule et même langue, dont les anciens dialectes et les formes actuelles présentent assez de traits structurels communs scientifiquement établis pour constituer une langue unitaire. Les locuteurs se comprennent spontanément et complètement sans traducteur ni dictionnaire. Les différences entre parler savant (langue littéraire moderne) et parlers populaires sont les mêmes en Moldavie et en Roumanie. Le nom scientifique de cette langue, adopté par tous les linguistes, est «daco-roumain» ou «daco-roman»_
